info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 4:01PM EST until January 02 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern Saratoga and Southern Washington Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain showers will change to a wintry mix of sleet and freezing rain late tonight and eventually change to all snow by the afternoon into the early evening hours on Sunday with falling temperatures into the teens and 20s Sunday night into Monday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
